title: Medsafetybench: Evaluating and improving the medical safety of large language models
details: T Han, A Kumar, C Agarwal, H Lakkaraju - The Thirty-eight Conference on Neural …, 2024
abstract: As large language models (LLMs) develop increasingly sophisticated capabilities and find applications in medical settings, it becomes important to assess their medical safety due to their far-reaching implications for personal and public health …
